episodes.title: The Name of the Game
episodes.description: When a Supe kills the love of his life, A/V salesman Hughie Campbell teams up with Billy Butcher, a vigilante hell-bent on punishing corrupt Supes.

episodes.title: Cherry
episodes.description: Hughie and Butcher bring Frenchie in to assist in their hunt for Translucent.

episodes.title: Get Some
episodes.description: It's the race of the century, as A-Train and Shockwave compete for the title of World's Fastest Man.

episodes.title: The Big Ride
episodes.description: With Butcher still missing, Hughie, Mother's Milk, Frenchie, and Kimiko go into hiding.

episodes.title: Proper Preparation and Planning
episodes.description: Butcher is back with the Boys, but tensions flare with Hughie.

episodes.title: Over the Hill with the Swords of a Thousand Men
episodes.description: The Boys take to the high seas to safeguard their prisoner.
